## IntersectionOfTypeUnion type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type IntersectionOfTypeUnion<Union extends TypeLink<unknown>> = (
    Union extends unknown ? (k: TypeOf<Union>) => void : never
) extends (k: infer Intersection) => void
    ? MergeIntersection<Intersection>
    : never;
```
